string-array.name: journal_prompts
string-array.item: What are three things you\'re grateful for today, and why?
Describe a challenge you faced recently and how you overcame it.
Write about a moment from your day that made you smile and why it had that effect on you.
What are three short-term goals you want to achieve in the next month, and what steps will you take to reach them?
Reflect on a mistake you made and the lessons you learned from it.
Describe a place that brings you peace and why it has that effect on you.
Write a letter to your future self, detailing your hopes and aspirations.
List five things that make you unique and special.
Explore a hobby or interest you\'ve been curious about but haven\'t tried yet.
What are your top priorities in life right now, and how do you plan to balance them?
Write about a book, movie, or piece of art that had a profound impact on you and why.
Reflect on a moment when you stepped out of your comfort zone and what you gained from the experience.
Explore your favorite childhood memories and the emotions associated with them.
Describe the kind of person you aspire to be and the steps you can take to become that person.
What are your strengths, and how can you leverage them to achieve your goals?
Write about a time when you felt proud of yourself and the achievements that led to that feeling.
Explore a fear or insecurity you have and brainstorm ways to overcome it.
Create a bucket list of experiences you want to have in your lifetime.
Reflect on a relationship in your life and the positive impact it has had on you.
What are some habits you want to cultivate or break, and how can you work towards those changes?
